title: Windwall should be more like riposte
body:
Windwall should be like fiora's riposte in that it has to be timed to "catch" the projectile and not something you can just throw out and sits there for a day and a half.

Also "_projectile_" is apparently a vague term to riot because things that run along the ground like {{champion:267}}  tsunami and {{champion:161}} void rift also get blocked.

replies.body: "Projectile" is a term that encompasses any non-minion ability/autoattack that moves from one point to another with a travel time. By that definition, Braum's ult is also a projectile, as is poppy's ult. The visuals don't actually matter here; they're just fluff to gussy up a purely mechanical effect.
